html:
At least something had been built
Out of bones, bugs and anger
Structures of such
Glare with atrocity
Caffeine liquid
Will distract
So I wonâ€™t experience
The full disgust
And if anxiety hits
I will grab tranquility
It will calm me down
And let me sleep
So this part of the cathedral
Is full of bugs
Constantly looking
For something to eat
title: Bugs
